author: Anita Jesse
content: This was more than worth waiting for! I am glad to hear that you are fine and delighted to see these photos. Is this how it's done? I'm looking for some flat light! ðŸ˜‰  These are all gorgeous, and each time I clicked on the photo for the larger image I thought, "Wait, maybe this is my favorite." By the way, to my eye the processing on the water couldn't be better.
